customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)

inline.description:
Compliance and Auditing Loading Indicator
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Ensure System Console ➜ Compliance ➜ Compliance Monitoring ➜ Enable Compliance Reporting is set to True
  2. In Compliance and Auditing section, run a report and check a loading indicator is displayed when the compliance report runs
inline.expectedResult: • Loading indicator should be displayed to the user when the export operation is in progress.

customFields.Related ticket(s): Add loading indicator for compliance monitoring export that are in progress — MM-19728
